channel.title: Critical Skills on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Critical Skills on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: The 5 Most Critical Statistical Concepts
item.description: It seems like everywhere we look, data is being generated - from politics, to biology, to publishing, to social networks. There are also diverse new computational tools, like GPGPU and cloud computing, that expand the statistical toolbox. Statistical theory is more advanced than its ever been, with exciting work in a range of areas.Â With all the excitement going on around statistics, there is also increasing diversity. It is increasingly hard to define “statistician” since the definition ranges from very mathematical to very applied.
